item.description:
Let's have a Yankee Swap for The Holidays!!!

Please bring a wrapped gift for each fur baby you plan on bringing to the meet up on Sunday, December 9th. This way, each dog will go home with a new toy!!

In addition, Best Friends will be collecting for their "Angel Tree". The Angel Tree benefits local shelters and rescues and provides a happy Holiday for those pets who do not have forever homes yet. Please donate to this wonderful cause. You can check out the photos of the pets in need on the tree and donate something specifically for that pet or something in general for the shelter/rescue.

Examples of items donated in the past: toys, beds, food, blankets, etc. Feel free to check with the Customer Service Staff for specific items that the shelter or rescue has requested.

Let's make this a wonderful Holiday for all those wonderful pets in need.

Agni
item.name: December Meet Up - Yankee Swap/Angel Tree
